references.paper_title: VGGFace2: a dataset for recognising faces across pose and age
references.reason: This paper provides a crucial dataset used for training the AdaFace model, enabling the creation of the face encoder used in the research.

references.paper_title: PixArt-α: Fast training of diffusion transformer for photorealistic text-to-image synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces a relevant method for photorealistic text-to-image synthesis which is directly compared with the proposed approach in the study.

references.paper_title: AnimateDiff: Animate your personalized text-to-image diffusion models without specific tuning
references.reason: This is a highly relevant work that is directly compared against the proposed method, showcasing the generation of videos.

references.paper_title: StyleGAN-NADA: CLIP-guided domain adaptation of image generators
references.reason: This paper provides a crucial comparative model utilized in assessing the authenticity and compositionality of the generated images.

references.paper_title: SDXL: Improving latent diffusion models for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper offers a state-of-the-art method for high-resolution image synthesis directly compared with the proposed AdaFace approach.
